
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18730147" title="发布于 2025-02-22 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">推荐几款开源且免费的 .NET MAUI 组件库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家推荐 3 款开源且免费的 .NET MAUI 组件库。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET MAUI介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 多平台应用 UI (.NET MAUI) 是一个跨平台框架，用于使用 C# 和 XAML 创建本机移动和桌面应用。使用 .NET MAUI，可从单个共享代码库开发可在 Android、iOS、macOS 和 Windows 上运行的应用。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247499164&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=a318fe75fcb39006481263b364ed6033&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>.NET开源免费的跨平台框架 - MAUI（附学习资料）</span></a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221203848675-1974116480.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Uranium</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>Uranium是一个.NET MAUI开源免费的UI工具包。它提供了一组用于构建现代应用程序的控件和<span>实用程序，它构建在.NET MAUI基础架构之上，并提供一组控件和布局来构建现代UI。它还提供了用于在其上构建自定义控件和主题的基础设施。</span></span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/enisn/UraniumUI" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/enisn/UraniumUI</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247498936&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=809f909ab363658aa14f8feea00b0376&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UNhXBQePRmiBBG31jEt2Kg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221203906850-625692641.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221203913521-829197349.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>V-Control</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>V-Control 是一个适用于 .NET MAUI 的开源(<span>MIT license)、免费的 UI 组件库，它提供了一组开箱即用的 UI 控件，可快速搭建面向业务的<span>应用程序界面。</span></span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/jevonsflash/V-Control" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/jevonsflash/V-Control</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510404&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=5ba3c3854a127410c5c6001e8acfde8b&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/zN_56i4C9Uhj_oJQWl0f5Q</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221203927894-108944701.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221203944650-1450452019.gif" alt=""></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AlohaKit</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AlohaKit是一组.NET MAUI绘制的开源、免费（MIT License）UI控件库。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/jsuarezruiz/AlohaKit.Controls" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/jsuarezruiz/AlohaKit.Controls</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247505465&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ca73420308e3d4968fda1bc0762d8da6&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Joq8xb8rqzHH9ag1hDXIQQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221204001193-1272555797.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250221204005321-483987215.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>以上项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</a></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
